about_the_game: The game is a multiplayer online 2D tank shooting game. There are two sides in total: the blue side and the red side, each side can have 1-4 people participate, and the number of people from both sides must be equal, so at most 8 people can participate. After the game starts, two teams will form a group battle. The one who eliminates all opponents first will win the final victory. The game map includes various terrains such as grasslands, swamps, snow, lakes, etc., each of which will have different impacts on the tank's movement; The game has normal  bullet and two types of special bullets: super bullet and flash bullet. Being hit by super bullet will result in 200% attack damage and some armor piercing damage, while being hit by a flash bullet will have a certain dizziness effect; There are various props in the game, which can be obtained by hitting a special tank. There are props that can enhance various attributes of the tank, such as attack power, defense power, movement speed, attack speed, armor piercing ability, etc. There are also props for obtaining super bullet and flash bullet.
detailed_description: The game is a multiplayer online 2D tank shooting game. There are two sides in total: the blue side and the red side, each side can have 1-4 people participate, and the number of people from both sides must be equal, so at most 8 people can participate. After the game starts, two teams will form a group battle. The one who eliminates all opponents first will win the final victory. The game map includes various terrains such as grasslands, swamps, snow, lakes, etc., each of which will have different impacts on the tank's movement; The game has normal  bullet and two types of special bullets: super bullet and flash bullet. Being hit by super bullet will result in 200% attack damage and some armor piercing damage, while being hit by a flash bullet will have a certain dizziness effect; There are various props in the game, which can be obtained by hitting a special tank. There are props that can enhance various attributes of the tank, such as attack power, defense power, movement speed, attack speed, armor piercing ability, etc. There are also props for obtaining super bullet and flash bullet.
developers: 南京欢腾软件技术有限公司
name: Bark Tank

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo CPU T6400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200U CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 64 GB available space

publishers: 南京欢腾软件技术有限公司
short_description: This game is a multiplayer online tank shooting game. The game has a team battle mode. Players eliminate enemy tanks through cooperation and flexible positioning. Only the side that survives in the midst of gunfire and kills all enemy players' tanks will win.
